nycsquirrels18 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

nycsquirrels18

The goal of nycsquirrels18 is to make it easy for R users to use data from The Squirrel Census. Data come from here.

Installation

You can install the the development version from GitHub with:

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("mine-cetinkaya-rundel/nycsquirrels18")

Example

Load and skim the data:

library(nycsquirrels18)
library(skimr)
library(knitr)

skim(squirrels)
#> Skim summary statistics
